title: Isolating the term with the exponent

title: The range of the exponential function
text: For the function $$y$$ $$=$$ $$e^{x+10}$$, what values of $$y$$ are possible?
speech: For the function  y   is equal to  , e raised to the x plus 10 power , what values of  y  are possible?
pacedSpeech: , e raised to the x plus 10 power
